headline: LEYBOLD VACUUM PUMPING SYSTEM 123 CFM
keywords: roots blowers stacks pump stacks blower packages
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Vacuum Pumping Systems
specstable:
Manufacturer Leybold
Model D40BCS/WSU501
Pumping Speed 122.9 CFM (3,472.8 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 1.00E-4(En) torr (1.33E-4 mbar)
Inlet Flange ISO-K 63.0 mm (2.480 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 40.0 mm (1.575 in)
Backing Pump Model D40BCS
Roots Pump Model WSU501
Other Information System features
  • ARS 40-65 Filter (Filter with feed back)
  • EIS system 40-65 (Electric indicator system)
  • IGS 40/65 (Inert gas system)
  • CFS 40-65 (Chemical system)
  • LSS 40-65 (Limit switch system)
  • PSS/LOS/ROS (Local-remote operation)
  • Full drip pan
Power Requirements 460 V 9.6 A 60 Hz 3 Phase
Year of Manufacture 1999
Exterior Dimensions
Width 26.000 in (66.0 cm)
Depth 35.000 in (88.9 cm)
Height 43.000 in (109.2 cm)
Weight 757 lb (343 kg)
